targets.expr:
(
  sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$target",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"}) +
  (
    sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$tolerated",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"}) -
    sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$target",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"})
  )/2
) 
/ sum(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service="$service", path!="/health"})

(
    (sum (http_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code=~"^5..$", service="$service",service="$service", path!="/health", path!="/metrics"}) +  (sum (http_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code=~"^4..$", service="$service",service="$service", path!="/health", path!="/metrics"})))/ sum (http_request_duration_seconds_count{service="$service", path!="/health", path!="/metrics"}))

panels.title: GQL Resolver invocation rate over time range

targets.expr:
(
  sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$target",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"}) +
  (
    sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$tolerated",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"}) -
    sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="$target",status_code=~"^[2,3]..$", service="$service", path!="/health"})
  )/2
) 
/ sum(http_request_duration_seconds_count{service="$service", path!="/health"})

panels.title: Top 10 API calls (by path) In Last 24 hours

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(max_over_time(http_request_duration_seconds_count{code=~"^5..$", service="$service", path!='/health'}[6s])- min_over_time(http_request_duration_seconds_count{code=~"^5..$", service="$service", path!='/health'}[24h])) by (method, path))

panels.title: Top 10 API Error Calls ( 5XX and 4XX, by path)
